title: Studio - $950 ALL BILLS PAID
posting_body: ['Spacious Studio Apartment located downstairs across from the pool.', 'Small community located just blocks from the Beach, Local attractions ( Moody Gardens, Schlitterbahn Water Park) , Restaurants, Shopping, and Community Park right across the street.', 'What are you waiting for?', ' Come live on the Island.', 'Enjoy that laid back living that comes with living on this small piece of heaven.', 'Give me a call today @', 'show contact info', '.', "We only have one to rent and it won't last long!", 'Amy', 'Amenities:', '- Parking - parking lot with covered walk ways', '- Pool', '- Unfurnished', '- Yard', 'Appliances:', '- Air Conditioning', '- Dishwasher', '- Garbage Disposal', '- Range', '- Refrigerator', '- Oven', '- Laundry Room On-Site', '- On-Site Mailboxes', 'Lease Lengths:', "- 12 Month's lease", 'Pets:', '- Cats Allowed', '- Medium Weight Dogs Allowed', 'Utilities:', '- Electricity Included', '- Gas Included', '- Heat Included', '- Water Included']
